src_original: śravaṇānarthikatā,  avicāraṇā,  anāryacaryā,  mānātimānavivṛddhiḥ,  kāya-vāk-citta-karmāpariśuddhiḥ,  saddharmāparirakṣaṇam,

alpakuśalamūlamanyanā,  anupāyapatitabuddhiḥ,  parāṅmukhībhūya triratnāśaṃsanam,  bodhisattvavyāpādacintanam /  aśrutadharmaprahāṇam,
'putri/ dvātriṃśad ime mahāyānasya āntarāyikāḥ samyak vyapadiṣṭāḥ /
kiṃ tarhi? tathāpi putri,  yāvanto hi mahāyānaguṇā antarāyā api tāvantastāvad ityuktam /
api ca, aprameyā antarāyadharmā bahuṣu sūtreṣu dṛśyante,
aparāṇyapi sāṃkathyāni bahūni vartante-sughoraparuṣaṃ suduḥsahaṃ dukhaṃ ciraṃ sahyata idamapi mahadāścaryam /
bhāryā gṛhaṃ ca prahāya suvratādāne 'pi sadā kāyavāṅmanovikṣepa idamapi mahadāścaryam /
svalpamātrasyāpi kuśalamūlasya abhāve 'pi tasyaivārthato buddhajñānagaveṣaṇam idamapi
tasmād bhavanto muktikāmā vidvāṃsastairunmattaiḥ saha akṛtasaṃsargā apramattās tiṣṭhantu /
evaṃ te karuṇāviṣayatvavyatiriktāḥ uttamamārgavyapadeśe 'pi tatra na praviśanti,  kimahaṃ karavāṇi /
yāvad abhijñatā na prāpyate tāvad anyeṣāṃ vipākāsaṃbhavāt khaḍgavat sthātavyam /
mitravat tridhātuprayogaṃ kurvannapi nirvāṇāśayatā,  vipuladāne 'pi vipākanirapekṣatā,  sarvadharmānutpādajñāne 'pi karmavipākānutsargaḥ,  sarvadharmanairātmyajñāne 'pi sattveṣu karuṇotpādaḥ /
atra bodhisattvānāṃ ratnopamāḥ pañcāśad dharmāḥ prāṇopamādayaḥ /
hatacittapuruṣavat gṛhastho bodhisattva evaṃ vicārayati- kadāhaṃ brahmacārī bhaveyam /  pravrajita evaṃ cintayati- kadāhaṃ jagato duḥkhāni moktuṃ kṣama iti /
bālopamaḥ suvāk,  sphūrtimān,  sukhadaḥ,  sutoṣaḥ,  supoṣaḥ,  subharaḥ,  santuṣṭaśca /
